Thermostatic Bath -90C to +200C

Thermal Control & Accessories

Stable circulation control for analytical instruments.

Thermostatic Bath

Performance

  • Range: -90C to +200C
  • Stability: +/-0.03

Typical Use

Reactor jacket control, viscosity testing, and external loop circulation.
